name: SDL Trados Studio Project Template
summary: An SDLTPL file is a template created by SDL Trados Studio, a program used by businesses to edit, review, and manage translation projects. It contains one or more files added by a user intended to be translated to a different language or reviewed by another user. SDLTPL files are used for creating multiple projects with the same settings.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: SDLTPL file open in SDL Trados Studio 2017
images.alt: SDLTPL file open in SDL Trados Studio 2017
